objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#f7f5f0;stop-opacity:1' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#f0e9e1;stop-opacity:1' /></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#ff6b4a;stop-opacity:0.7' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#ffb347;stop-opacity:0.7' /></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><path d='M0,350 Q540,200 1080,350 L1080,600 Q540,750 0,600 Z' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.3'/><g opacity='0.1'><path d='M0,0 L1080,1080' stroke='#333333' stroke-width='5' stroke-dasharray='10 15'/><path d='M1080,0 L0,1080' stroke='#333333' stroke-width='5' stroke-dasharray='10 15'/></g><g opacity='0.1'><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='100' fill='#ff6b4a'/><circle cx='880' cy='880' r='100' fill='#ffb347'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
ENERGYRODS 2.0 • LIGHTSTRIKE PRO CUSHIONING
CONTINENTAL RUBBER OUTSOLE

product_details.description: The Boston Marathon is a race. But it's also a goal, and a training plan and all the days it stays on your mind before the big one. The Adizero Boston 12 Shoes are built for mid- to long-distance running. They bring a race-day feel to training with a propulsive feel that comes from the glass-fiber infused ENERGYRODS 2.0, which limit energy loss underfoot. They're fast, but that does not come at the cost of durability - the midsole layers ultra-light LIGHTSTRIKE PRO cushioning with a new version of durable LIGHTSTRIKE 2.0 EVA. Continental Rubber outsole ENERGYRODS 2.0 limit energy loss Imported Sole material - Rubber ** Closure type - Lace-Up **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern, high-energy running shoe promotion. The background features a soft diagonal cream gradient with stylized dash lines and overlapping translucent geometric elements for depth. A central shoe image (`product_image`) dominates the composition, slanted dynamically over a warm orange abstract shape that creates motion. The main title (`heading`) is styled in a bold, dark gray font at the top, supplemented by a red-orange tagline (`tagline`) just below it to emphasize performance. A compact feature description (`description`) sits under the product, followed by a brightly colored price (`price`) in large font. A rounded orange call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with "SHOP NOW" (`cta`) text completes the layout. Fonts are bold, modern, and sans-serif throughout.

**Color Palette:**
- Warm Cream: `#f7f5f0`, `#f0e9e1`
- Burnt Orange: `#FF6347`, `#ff6b4a`
- Lemon Yellow: `#ffb347`
- Charcoal Gray: `#333333`
- White: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image features a dynamic and modern color palette suitable for an energetic advertisement banner. Dominated by neutral beige (#E8E2D2) on the upper mesh, the shoe highlights gradient accents ranging from vivid orange (#FF5722) to warm yellow (#FFC107), symbolizing speed and motion. The black stripes (#212121) introduce contrast and brand identity, while touches of red (#EF4444) on the tongue and lace area add vibrancy. The white and gray sole (#F5F5F5 and #9E9E9E) grounds the design. These colors are smoothly blended to convey a sense of flow while contrasted smartly to ensure brand visibility and energetic appeal.
